statements: SELECT grant_id, grant_title, grant_amount FROM grants;
SELECT organization, grant_description FROM grants WHERE grant_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE organization = 'ABC Foundation';
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000;
SELECT grant_title, grant_description FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT grant_title, organization, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC, grant_title ASC
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, grant_date FROM grants WHERE organization='ABC Foundation' ORDER BY grant_date ASC
SELECT grant_title, organization, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY grant_date DESC
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount ASC, grant_title DESC
SELECT grant_title, organization, grant_date FROM grants WHERE grant_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY grant_date ASC, grant_title ASC
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT organization_name, proposal_description, submission_date FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT proposal_id, organization_name, approval_status FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY approval_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals WHERE organization_name = 'Example Org';
SELECT funding_id, proposal_id, funding_amount, funding_date FROM funding_history ORDER BY funding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT proposal_id, organization_name, proposal_description FROM grant_proposals WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY proposal_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_proposals, SUM(funding_amount) AS total_funding FROM grant_proposals LEFT JOIN funding_history ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = funding_history.proposal_id;
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(proposal_id) AS total_proposals FROM grant_proposals GROUP BY organization_name HAVING total_proposals > 1;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals WHERE organization_name LIKE '%Science%' AND submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT proposal_name, submission_date FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_name, organization_name FROM grant_proposals WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Organization';
SELECT * FROM funding_history WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM grant_reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT proposal_name, submission_date FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM funding_history WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_name, organization_name FROM grant_proposals JOIN funding_history ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = funding_history.proposal_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, organization_name, expertise_area FROM grant_reviewers ORDER BY organization_name, expertise_area;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT proposal_name, submission_date FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM funding_sources WHERE source_type = 'Government';
SELECT proposal_id, status FROM grant_proposals WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY proposal_id ASC;
SELECT proposal_name, proposal_description FROM grant_proposals WHERE proposal_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT proposal_name, status FROM grant_proposals WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT source_name, amount FROM funding_sources JOIN funding_history ON funding_sources.source_id = funding_history.source_id WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT proposal_name, reviewer_name, score FROM grant_proposals JOIN proposal_reviews ON grant_proposals.proposal_id = proposal_reviews.proposal_id WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_proposals, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM funding_history;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT organization_name, grant_amount FROM grant_proposals ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM funding_history WHERE funding_amount > 5000;
SELECT funding_date, funding_amount FROM funding_history WHERE funding_amount < 3000 ORDER BY funding_date ASC;
SELECT organization_name, industry FROM organizations;
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals;
SELECT organization_name, grant_amount FROM grant_proposals WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM funding_history WHERE funding_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT organizations.organization_name, grant_proposals.grant_amount FROM organizations JOIN grant_proposals ON organizations.organization_name = grant_proposals.organization_name;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(proposal_id) AS proposals_count FROM grant_categories JOIN grant_proposals ON grant_categories.category_id = grant_proposals.proposal_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(proposal_id) > 5 ORDER BY proposals_count DESC;
